title: So, It’s All Bullsh*t
description:
Joe Biden pledged to decriminalize cannabis use – now he’s issued pardons for people convicted at the national level of possessing small amounts of marijuana. There’s just one problem… no-one is actually in federal prison solely for possession of marijuana #marijuana #drugs #biden 

References
https://jacobin.com/2022/10/biden-marijuana-pardons-legalization-republicans
https://www.itv.com/news/2022-10-06/biden-pardons-thousands-declaring-no-one-should-be-in-jail-for-using-marijuana
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-63166964
